findings.title: CRI - Claim Reward Inconsistency
findings.description: The contract distributes rewarded tokens even if the amount is insufficient, which may produce issues since users would receive a different amount than expected.

findings.title: STC - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The contract may wrongly assume that the transfer has been established if the result of the transfer methods is not checked.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code elimination is required to remove unnecessary code.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: The comparison to boolean constants is redundant. Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Variables defined in local scope have same name as upper scope variables.
